trans-unit.source: .NET Run Command
trans-unit.target: .NET 运行命令

trans-unit.source: Command used to run .NET apps
trans-unit.target: 用于运行 .NET 应用的命令

trans-unit.source: Build and run the app using the specified framework. The framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的框架生成和运行应用。框架必须在项目文件中指定。

trans-unit.source: The path to the project file to run (defaults to the current directory if there is only one project).
trans-unit.target: 要运行的项目文件的路径(如果只有一个项目，则默认使用当前目录)。

trans-unit.source: The build failed. Please fix the build errors and run again.
trans-unit.target: 生成失败。请修复生成错误并重新运行。

trans-unit.source: Arguments passed to the application that is being run.
trans-unit.target: 传递到运行中应用程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: Do not build the project before running. Implies --no-restore.
trans-unit.target: 运行之前不要生成项目。Implies --no-restore.

trans-unit.source: Unable to run your project Your project targets multiple frameworks. Please specify which framework to run using '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 无法运行项目 你的项目面向多个框架。请指定要使用“{0}”运行的框架。

trans-unit.source: Unable to run your project. Please ensure you have a runnable project type and ensure '{0}' supports this project. A runnable project should target a runnable TFM (for instance, netcoreapp2.0) and have OutputType 'Exe'. The current {1} is '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: 无法运行项目。 请确保你具有可运行的项目类型且“{0}”支持此项目。 可运行的项目应面向可运行的 TFM (例如 netcoreapp2.0)且其 OutputType 为“Exe”。 当前的 {1} 为“{2}”。

trans-unit.source: Couldn't find a project to run. Ensure a project exists in {0}, or pass the path to the project using {1}.
trans-unit.target: 找不到要运行的项目。请确保 {0} 中存在项目，或使用 {1} 传递项目路径。

trans-unit.source: Specify which project file to use because {0} contains more than one project file.
trans-unit.target: 执行要使用的项目文件，因为 {0} 包含多个项目文件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the launch profile (if any) to use when launching the application.
trans-unit.target: 启动应用程序时使用的启动配置文件名称（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt to use launchSettings.json to configure the application.
trans-unit.target: 请勿尝试使用 launchSettings.json 配置应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The specified launch profile could not be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的启动配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The launch profile "{0}" could not be applied. {1}
trans-unit.target: 无法应用启动配置文件“{0}”。 {1}

trans-unit.source: (Default)
trans-unit.target: (默认值)

trans-unit.source: Using launch settings from {0}...
trans-unit.target: 从 {0} 使用启动设置...

trans-unit.source: A profile with the specified name could not be found or is not a valid JSON object.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定名称的配置文件或该配置文件不是有效的 JSON 对象。

trans-unit.source: The launch profile type '{0}' is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持启动配置文件类型“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: A usable launch profile could not be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到可用的启动配置文件。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected exception occurred while processing launch settings: {0}
trans-unit.target: 处理启动设置时出现意外异常: {0}

trans-unit.source: The 'profiles' property of the launch settings document is not a JSON object.
trans-unit.target: 启动设置文档的“profiles”属性不是 JSON 对象。

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered when reading launchSettings.json. {0}
trans-unit.target: 读取 launchSettings.json 时发生错误。 {0}

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is not a valid project file.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”不是有效的项目文件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration to run for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.
trans-unit.target: 要运行的配置。大多数项目的默认值是 "Debug"。

trans-unit.source: The target framework to run for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 要运行的目标框架。必须在项目文件中指定目标框架。
